I have Google'd and Yahoo'd until my head is about to fall off and I
don't=
 have a good answer.  Hoping you folks can lend a thought.

I have been tes=
ting Heritrix on Linux and am confused about the "free
memory" as is report=
ed by the top command.

Heritrix shows the following in the Admin Console:
=

16730 KB used
27068 KB current heap
260160 KB max heap

The machine has 51=
2MB of memory, but the free memory as reported in
the top command gradually=
 shrinks to around 6MB when Heritrix is
started and doing work.

Any though=
ts as to why this happens?
